SEARCH
Module OOP
Package OOPProject

Class AppointmentServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
OOPProject.AppointmentServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
AppointmentService
public class AppointmentServiceImpl extends Object implements AppointmentService
Implementation of the AppointmentService interface, providing methods for scheduling, canceling, and managing appointments, appointment slots, and appointment outcomes.

      scheduleAppointment in interface AppointmentService
      Parameters:
      patientID - the ID of the patient
      doctorID - the ID of the doctor
      dateOfChoice - the desired date for the appointment
      startTime - the starting time of the appointment
      endTime - the ending time of the appointment

      public boolean addAppointmentSlot(String doctorID, String startTime, String endTime, Date date)
      Adds a new appointment slot for a specific doctor.
      Specified by:
      addAppointmentSlot in interface AppointmentService
      Parameters:
      doctorID - the ID of the doctor
      startTime - the starting time of the appointment slot
      endTime - the ending time of the appointment slot
      date - the date of the appointment slot
      Returns:
      true if the appointment slot was successfully added, false otherwise

    • addAppointmentOutcome

      public void addAppointmentOutcome(String appointmentOutcomeID, Appointment appointment, MedicalRecord medicalRecord, String consultationNotes, PrescriptionStatus status)
      Adds an outcome for a completed appointment.
      Specified by:
      addAppointmentOutcome in interface AppointmentService
      Parameters:
      appointmentOutcomeID - the ID of the appointment outcome
      appointment - the completed appointment
      medicalRecord - the associated medical record
      consultationNotes - any consultation notes from the appointment
      status - the prescription status of the appointment outcome
